QfqosmonitoringstateEnum.description: The state of QoS monitoring per QoS flow per UE.

isEventTriggeredQFMonitoringSupported.description: It indicates whether the event based QoS monitoring reporting per QoS flow per UE is supported.

isPeriodicQFMonitoringSupported.description: It indicates whether the periodic QoS monitoring reporting per QoS flow per UE is supported.

isSessionReleasedQFMonitoringSupported.description: It indicates whether the session release based QoS monitoring reporting per QoS flow per UE is supported.

qFMeasurementPeriod.description: It specifies the period (in seconds) for reporting the packet delay for QoS monitoring per QoS flow per UE.

qFMinimumWaitTime.description: It specifies the minimum waiting time (in seconds) between two consecutive reports for event triggered QoS monitoring reporting per QoS flow per UE.

qFMonitoredSNSSAIs.description: The S-NSSAIs for which the QoS monitoring per QoS flow per UE is to be performed.

qFPacketDelayThresholds.description: It specifies the thresholds for reporting the packet delay between PSA and UE for QoS monitoring per QoS flow per UE.

qFQoSMonitoringState.description: The state of QoS monitoring per QoS flow per UE.
